group_1.narration: I can stop it.@Even rewind it.
My magic exists to protect Madoka.
But I can't fight using@that magic alone.

group_1.textRight: Stopping time… An impressive power, for sure.@It will be hard to utilize, though.

group_1.narration: I started by crafting home-made bombs.@With them I could finally fight.
But as time wore on...@I needed to expand my arsenal.
That's why...@I set my sights on guns.

group_1.textRight: Homura.@You showed great promise in today's fight.
You were wonderful, Homura!@[chara:200100:cheek_0:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json]You fired those guns just like Mami!

group_1.textLeft: I have a long way to go before@I can compare myself to Mami...

group_1.textRight: I've been meaning to ask, how @are you doing for weapons?

group_1.textLeft: I went through so much ammunition@just in today's fight...

group_1.textRight: Unlike the guns I use with my magic,@your weapons are real.
Ammo is a problem, correct?@Just don't overdo it...

group_1.narration: If I run out of weapons, I'll just get more.@There are many criminals to take them from.
After I broke off from the other girls I @looked into criminal groups in the area.
Groups operating outside of the law...@Those who were likely to be stocking guns.
There turned out to be some groups@just like that in Kamihama, too.

group_1.textCenter: The Blue Seas Family...@Though this group seems to abide by the law.
But the others... Real villains who have@even corrupted and infiltrated the police…
They should have the means @to stock up on illegal firearms.

group_1.narration: Okay! They're next.@I have my target in my sights.
All that's left...@is to actually steal them!

group_1.textCenter: But now that it's time to act...@I'm starting to get the jitters...
I'm picking a fight with terrifying people…
I have to do this, though...!
